title: additionalProperties
description: describes properties not accounted for by the "properties" or "patternProperties" keywords
content: The value of this property must be either a schemas, or a boolean.
If this value is boolean false, then properties other than those listed in "properties" or "patternProperties" are not allowed.
If this value is a schema, then any properties that are not described by the "properties" or "patternProperties" keywords are described by that schema.
If this value is not specified, then additional properties can contain anything (same as boolean true).
